Package com.example.wizard309.entities

Class Character

java.lang.Object
com.example.wizard309.entities.Entity
com.example.wizard309.entities.Character
Direct Known Subclasses:
BadGuy, BattleCharacter, Enemy, Player, Wisp, Wizard
public abstract class Character extends Entity
abstract class used to create different types of characters from enemies to players, and other players
